reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater warm and well-made, with one mentioning it's perfect for cold weather.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars WORTH IT!!
items.body: *Pardon the dog hair* I was immediately impressed with this sweater. It’s soft and not scratchy at all! So cute so nice. Perfect oversized sweater. True to size - I ordered a large Read more
items.author: lauren lutt

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this sweater!
items.body: I love this amazing sweater. It’s perfect for this cold weather, looks great and I received countless compliments. I will be purchasing all the other colors as well. Read more
items.author: Lee Lee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful - Well Made!
items.body: Beautiful! Extremely well made. Would highly recommend. And oh soooo warm. Read more
items.author: Creatively Organized LLC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect winter sweater.
items.body: Great sweater and priced right for the quality. This sweater looks and feels like it is high end. I will be purchasing additional sweaters in other colors. Read more
items.author: Deb Z

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks bulky on me. But beautiful color and warmth!
items.body: I love this brand and have purchased multiple sweaters from them as I prepare for winter. This one isn’t really my favorite compared to the others, but to be honest, if I had received this one first and wasn’t comparing it to the others, I’d be thrilled! It is soft and the color and fit are exactly as described. It doesn’t hang as low as I expected though, and it isn’t quite as relaxed, so it looks more bulky on me than I expected. Still, it’s warm and when the snow hits, who cares about looking bulky? It’s well made, and very comfortable, like most items I’ve worn from Aelfric Eden. It is machine washable (but they say to use a laundry bag), but you’re not supposed to put it in the dryer. I wish we were that organized with laundry around here! I can guarantee it will accidentally make it into the dryer. I’ll try to remember to come back to report if it holds up ok when that happens.i expect it to be durable enough for that, but i worry about shape and shrinkage. Read more
items.author: Maria

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super thick and soft
items.body: Beautiful, thick, chunky sweater. It looks like a wool sweater but it is very soft and cozy. Definitely has an expensive look and feel. I ordered a XS due to the reviews saying oversized. I’m 5’2” and 124 lbs and prefer a less baggy feel due to my size/frame. It fits perfect and hits above my hips in length. Planning on getting a second color. It won’t disappoint! Read more
items.author: suebea114

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Undecided
items.body: I am 5’7” and weigh 230 pounds. I initially ordered this cable sweater in XL, but it was far too oversized. I then tried the size X, which was only slightly better, with minimal difference. I also tested a medium, but the sleeves were too short. The lantern sleeves are disproportionately large, and the fabric feels quite thick. The one detail I did appreciate is that the cable design appears on both the front and back, which is rare to find. At this point, I’m still undecided about whether to keep the X. Read more
items.author: MajorAliceLazer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect winter sweater
items.body: Perfect winter sweater. Washed well, doesn’t pill. Feels like wool but no itch. Gorgeous Read more
items.author: Brad

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Beige, Black, Navy Blue, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
